werkzeugname.label: Werkzeugname
werkzeugname.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kategorie.label: Kategorie
kategorie.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

hersteller.label: Hersteller
hersteller.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

modellnummer.label: Modellnummer
modellnummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

seriennummer.label: Seriennummer
seriennummer.description: A string value not longer than 4000 characters (or `null`).

kaufdatum.label: Kaufdatum
kaufdatum.description:
A calendar date consisting of year, month and day. (Or `null`/`None`)

The field value will be a string in the format `<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>` or `null`.

For example: `1642-12-25`.

zustand.label: Aktueller Zustand
zustand.description:
One selected option of multiple available options (or `null`).

The available options are defined in the `lookup_data` attribute of this control's LivingApp.

The field value will be the key in this `lookup_data` attribute or `null`.

enddatum.label: Enddatum

werkzeug.label: Werkzeug
werkzeug.description:
A reference to another LivingApp record from a target lookup app (or `null`).

The field value will be a valid record URL in the form `https://<hostname>/rest/apps/<app-id>/records/<record-id>` or `null`.
